organizations: Catholic University Womens Lacrosse Initiation Party
lead_paragraph: Catholic University forfeited three women’s lacrosse games and will place the team on probationary status for the 2006-7 school year after an investigation of an off-campus freshman initiation party. The investigation began in the spring after photos showing what appeared to be a male stripper at a party were posted on the Internet under the heading “Catholic University Women’s Lacrosse Initiation Party 2006.”.
